title: Zoo
creator_credit: Firebird Films, Arthur Cantrill and Corinne Cantrill
brief_description: David spends a happy day at the zoo looking at and feeding all the animals. When he returns home, he makes a zoo of his own. The animals come to life and the monkeys imprison the keeper and begin to release the other animals. Disaster threatens but Elsie the elephant comes to the rescue. Cast: Aaron Judah. Narration: Aaron Judah. Music: Alan Lane.
